summary: keeps buffer menu at constant length, for tearoff usage
name: bufMenuToo
description:
The BufMenuToo Plugin makes the Buffer Menu remain a constant size for
use as tearoff menu. Now it can permanently stay open to show your 
buffers and still keeps a minimum size.

version: 0.0.1

INCOMPATIBLE with MiniBufExplorer
install_details: just drop it in your .vim/plugin folder
